TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs Inherits InputEventArgs
public ref class ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::Input::InputEventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用对象来指定操作的惯性行为。You can use the object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation. 你可以通过使用单独指定每种类型的操作的惯性行为， ，和属性。You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the , , and properties. 每个属性都为类型的对象，表示惯性行为以及每种情况下，你可以指定以下：Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - 惯性开始时初始速度。The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins. - 惯性结束时的操作所需的位置。The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends. - 惯性所需减速度。The desired deceleration of the inertia. 你通常指定惯性结束时的操作所需的位置，或者惯性，但不是两个所需的减速。You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序和设置需要的减速转换、 扩展以及在惯性过程中使用的旋转。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 此示例摘自在更大的示例[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Cancels the manipulation.

returns.span: 如果成功取消操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果方法成功，则默认发送以前为鼠标按下鼠标移动触控事件或鼠标释放到元素的事件，且不发生未来操作事件。If the method succeeds, the default sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ ExpansionBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaExpansionBehavior ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置延伸惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.

value.span: 延伸惯性运动减慢的速率

span.span: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定的操作所需的扩展，通过设置惯性结束时属性。Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 你通常设置或，但不是两者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Point ManipulationOrigin { System::Windows::Point get(); void set(System::Windows::Point value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置操作的起源点。

span.span: Gets or sets the point from which the manipulation originated.
The point from which the manipulation originated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多个联系点启动了操作，属性是所有的联系点之间的点。If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the property is the point between all of the points of contact. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.

span.span: A collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Input::InertiaRotationBehavior ^ RotationBehavior { System::Windows::Input::InertiaRotationBehavior ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Input::InertiaRotationBehavior ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置旋转惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.

value.span: 旋转惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: The rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 惯性结束通过设置时指定所需操作旋转属性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 你通常设置或，但不是两者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: Specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不需要调用此方法。You typically do not need to call this method. 使用上的属性相反。Use the properties on the instead.

span.span: is .

summary.span: 获取和设置线性惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: Gets and sets the rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.

value.span: 线性惯性运动减慢的速率。

span.span: The rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来执行以下操作：Use the property to do the following: - 通过设置开始时指定惯性的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定的操作所需的位置，通过设置惯性结束时属性。Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置指定所需的减速的惯性属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 你通常设置或，但不是两者。You typically set either the or the , but not both. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 响应操作的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建你的第一个 Touch 应用](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
